title: Looking for people to play with
body:
Clearing out my friends list.

Looking for people to play games with and learn from currently climbing silver elo however I seem to be directionally challenged as i'm climbing down not up (unsure if its a bug or not).

No but in all seriousness I want to learn the game better and get good at it so I can climb out of the low elo and I wouldn't mind playing draft pick with some higher elo players so that I can better see how they play and even get help from them.

so if you wouldn't mind have an average low elo jungler come and join in on some fun than please send me a request or post your username down and i'll send  you one.

thanks in advanced.

Shankš (to get the š its alt 0154)

replies.body: Silver four at this point but across all my 10 or so accounts, I never took ranked serious but I have been playing league for about 7-8 years now. If you want to play some games, I'm down for it. Give us an add and we'll have some fun.

Hey ya! 

II am currently unranked (I took a year off) and am a support main learning new roles. Feel free to add me if you would like.
